channel.title: RDP on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in RDP on TLDRBins

item.title: RDP
item.description: Enable RDP # Enable Terminal Server Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\System\CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server' -Name 'fDenyTSConnections' -Value 0 # Allow Inbound Traffic netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Open Port 3389 IN" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=3389 xfreerdp remmina xfreerdp /u:'<USER>' /p:'<PASSWORD>' /d:<DOMAIN> /v:<TARGET> /smart-sizing:1400x1080 remmina Fix ERRCONNECT_TLS_CONNECT_FAILED Advanced -> TLS Security Level -> 0
